location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Philip Henry Bridges, Commander of HM Sloop Challenger, Bushire to William Bruce, Honourable Company's Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter encloses a memorandum to be delivered to the Commander of every East India Company cruizer arriving at Bushire, and informing them that they are under P H Bridges's order and may be requested for particular duties.
